item.title: How to Debug
item.description: The easiest way to verify whether your code behaves as you expect is to set a breakpoint and inspect variable values. When the app stops at a breakpoint, enter po someProperty in the console (where po stands for print object).
item.dc:creator: Denis Rybkin

item.title: Guard understanding
item.description: Using guard makes your code more readable and simpler. guard is a keyword used for early exits in a function. The concept of early exit means checking conditions at the beginning of a function to determine whether the remaining body of the function needs to be executed or not.

item.title: Set collection improvement using .toggle()
item.description: There is a Bool.toggle() function which makes code more verbose and obvious. Same thing can be used for Set. If you need to change the state of one of the elements, add or remove it, avoiding boilerplate code. For example if you have filter or settings list in UI.
